name: Amazing Salmon Marinade
author: KitchenGod
summary: This marinade is great for grilled salmon. It works well with any cut of salmon. However, I typically use salmon fillets. I like king salmon best, but it works well on any type of fresh salmon. This marinade is enough for 3 pounds of salmon.
ingredients: ⅓ cup loosely packed fresh basil leaves
directions: Make a shallow pan from a double layer of aluminum foil
Place foil pan in a large baking sheet
Arrange salmon fillets in the prepared foil pan, skin-side down
Stir basil, honey, lemon, oil, soy sauce, shallot, Worcestershire sauce, and ginger together in a bowl; pour over salmon
Let salmon marinate for 30 minutes to 2 hours
Slide salmon in the foil pan off the baking sheet onto the preheated grill
Cook until salmon is easily flaked with a fork, about 20 minutes
